mapper.select: select s.supplier , supplier_person, location, contact_infomation, email, rno from supplier s join request_check r on s.supplier = r.supplier;
select s.supplier , supplier_person, location, contact_infomation, email, rno from supplier s join request_check r on s.supplier = r.supplier where s.supplier = #{supplier} limit 1;
select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, s.* from supplier s, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp ) as supplyList
